name: FAssetManagerSearchRules
doc: Rules for how to scan the asset registry for assets matching path and type descriptions

AssetScanPaths: List of top-level directories and specific assets to search, must be paths starting with /, directories should not have a trailing /
IncludePatterns: Optional list of include wildcard patterns using * that will get matched against full package path. If there are any at least one of these must match
ExcludePatterns: Optional list of exclude wildcard patterns that can use *, if any of these match it will be excluded
AssetBaseClass: Assets must inherit from this class, for blueprints this should be the instance base class
bHasBlueprintClasses: True if scanning for blueprints, false for all other assets
bForceSynchronousScan: True if this should force a synchronous scan of the disk even if an async scan is in progress
bSkipVirtualPathExpansion: True if AssetScanPaths are real paths that do not need expansion
bSkipManagerIncludeCheck: True if this test should skip the ShouldIncludeInAssetSearch function on AssetManager
